snippet: YOURDON--Ed, died suddenly on January 20, 2016 as a result of complications from a blood infection. He was a luminary in the computer software field and widely known as the lead developer of the structured analysis/design methods of the 1970s. In June 1997, he was inducted to the Computer Hall of Fame. He is survived by his loving family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: YOURDON--Ed, died suddenly on January 20, 2016 as a result of complications from a blood infection. He was a luminary in the computer software field and widely known as the lead developer of the structured analysis/design methods of the 1970s. In June 1997, he was inducted to the Computer Hall of Fame. He is survived by his loving family. 1/3
